TopicTitle: Is there a Kerbalkon this year?

Articles.Content: When Kerbalkon was going on last year I didn't know anything about ksp and just got the game and I was wondering when and where it was if they have one because I want to go.

Its not an event that you can go to at the moment it is just a live stream event from the devs over a whole day. It happens at the end of November. It is too early to know whether it will happen this year though.
